alert.note: Alert for Burleigh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 6:08PM CST until December 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Kidder, Dickey, La Moure, Logan, and Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
